scripts.start: rm -rf dist && npm run copy-assets-plain && cross-env NODE_ENV=development LOCAL_DEV=true parcel index.html
scripts.build: npm run copy-assets-plain && parcel build index.html --no-optimize
scripts.build:prod: npm run copy-assets-plain && cross-env NODE_ENV=production LOCAL_DEV=false parcel build index.html --dist-dir docs --no-source-maps --no-optimize --public-url ./ && cp CNAME docs && cp -r assets/* docs/
scripts.acp: git add . && git commit -m "x" --allow-empty && git push -u
scripts.deploy: npm run build:prod && npm run acp
